column4: greetings...how do i streamline Karmic?  What can i turn off/uninstall to make this machine respond faster?
does Karmic crawl on 900Mhz?  anyone else creeping along?
I would presume it matters on how much desktop effects you have activated
Usually your cpu is set to ondemand use. Install rcconf, run rcconf, and then uncheck ondemand
Also some daemons might be useless for you such as the bluetooth one (if you dont have bluetooth)
I would disable it because off by default
All default installs of ubuntu have it's settings off by default (however it is on in daemons which makes no sense)
For example max speed wired can be 2000gbps+ whereas wifi is max of 54mbps (27 if you're lucky)
Make sure your cpu settings are on ondemand mode and it'll most likely subside
